attributes.action: Require Universities to fully refund tuition fees for 2020/21 due to Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: Despite the relentless hard work of teaching staff, online lectures are inferior to in-person teaching and without access to libraries and resources, students are not receiving the education they deserve. Thanks to changes in government regulations, students are now paying rent on the property they can't legally occupy and refunding tuition fees is the first step in acknowledging the disadvantage current University students face and limiting the impact this has on their futures.
attributes.background: The Government should require Universities to fully refund student tuition fees for 2020/21.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
